title: RENOVATED STUDIO WITH CONDO STYLE KITCHEN
map_address: Park Avenue near E Sidney Avenue
posting_body: ['Great sized studio over 450 square feet with updated kitchen, with stainless steel appliances, abundant closet space, space big enough to fit a queen size bed comfortably and a separate bathroom.', 'Located in an elevator/laundry building with on-site super, parking garage and outdoor parking lot (waitlist for parking).', ' Access to a brand new courtyard and playground area.', ' Management office right around the block.', 'Only 2 blocks away from the Mount Vernon East Metro North station makes living in this building a commuters delight.', ' Also convenient to a super market, Rite Aid, a host of eateries, shops and more.', 'Text or email today to schedule your private viewing or if you have any questions.', 'Please note photos are from a similar unit in the building.', ' Finishes may not be exactly the same']
